name: lib/lexer.js
Lexer
description: Lexes a source-string into tokens.

name: constructor
description: Creates a new Lexer instance

params.name: source
params.description: The source string to operate on.

name: source
description: Gets the source being lexed

name: source
description: Sets the source being lexed

name: position
description: Returns the lexer's position in the source string

name: position
description: Sets the lexer's position in the source string

name: disable
description: Disables the specified token-type

name: enable
description: Enables/disables the specified token-type

params.name: enabled
params.description: Whether to enable/disable the token type

name: expect
description:
Like {@link next}, but throws an exception if the next token is
not of the required type.

params.name: type
params.description: The token type expected from {@link next}

name: next
description:
Consumes and returns the next {@link Token} in the source string.
If there are no more tokens, it returns a {@link Token} of type `$EOF`

name: peek
description:
Returns the next {@link Token} in the source string, but does
not consume it.
If there are no more tokens, it returns a {@link Token} of type `$EOF`

params.name: position
params.description: The position at which to start reading

name: pop
description: Pops the sub-lexer and returns lexing-control to `this`

name: push
description: Sets a sub-lexer that will operate on the source stream instead of `this`.

name: strpos
description: Converts a string-index (relative to the source string) to a line and a column.

name: token
description: Defines a token-type. If the token `type` starts with `$SKIP`, then those tokens will be skipped.

params.name: regex
params.description: The regular expression that will match this token.

name: lib/token.js
Token
description: Represents a token instance

name: constructor
description: Constructs a token

params.name: match
params.description: The string that the lexer consumed to create this token

params.name: groups
params.description: Any RegExp groups that accrued during the match

params.name: start
params.description: The string position where this match started

params.name: end
params.description: The string position where this match ends

name: type
description: The token type

name: match
description: The string that the lexer consumed to create this token

name: groups
description: Any RegExp groups that accrued during the match

name: start
description: The string position where this match started

name: end
description: The string position where this match ends

name: lexer
description: The parent {@link Lexer}

name: strpos
description: Returns the bounds of this token, each in `{line, column}` format
